last_episode_to_air.name: Holy Grail
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ashley and his team go after one of the biggest legends from the Middle Ages, the Holy Grail, thought to be the cup used by Jesus at the Last Supper.

name: Legend Quest
overview: Legend Quest is an American adventure television series that premiered on July 13, 2011, on the SyFy channel. The series follows historian and adventure-seeker Ashley Cowie in his quest to crack the code on his hunt for the most powerful lost treasures in the world. On March 12, 2012, TVWise reported that the series has been cancelled by Syfy.

episodes.name: Ark of the Covenant/Mayan Talking Cross
episodes.overview: Ashley and the team travel to Ethiopia, Italy and France in search of the famous Ark of the Covenant, believed to have the power to defeat any army and strike enemies with bolts of lightening. They then travel to Mexico in search of the legendary Talking Cross, which the Mayans believed gave them the power to speak directly to the gods, protect them from their enemies and grant wishes

episodes.name: Excalibur/Lost Cintamani Stone
episodes.overview: The team searches for the most famous sword in the world, King Arthur's Excalibur. Later, they seek a stone out of Hindu and Buddhist legend which is said to be able to grant wishes to those who possess it.

episodes.name: Holy Lance/Incan Golden Sun Disc
episodes.overview: The team seek out a powerful spear in Europe which is reputed to have been used at Jesus' Crucufixion. Later, they travel to Peru to look into legends of a gold disc which can allegedly stop time.

episodes.name: Staff of Moses/The Stone of Destiny
episodes.overview: Ian and his team search for clues about the staff of Moses in Israel. Next, they attempt to discover the true location of the Stone of Destiny in Scotland.

episodes.name: Merlin's Magical Treasures/King Solomon's Ring
episodes.overview: Ashley and his team search the UK for treasures said to have been hidden away by the sorceror Merlin. Later, they attempt to find the magical signet ring of King Solomon, which is said to give its wearer the ability to command the djinn and to understand the speech of animals.

episodes.name: Holy Grail
episodes.overview: Ashley and his team go after one of the biggest legends from the Middle Ages, the Holy Grail, thought to be the cup used by Jesus at the Last Supper.
